tags.content: Updating Gatsby, Plugins and Solving Sharp Dependency Building Failure on Ubuntu using WSL

attributes.content: Updating Gatsby, Plugins and Solving Sharp Dependency Building Failure on Ubuntu using WSL

attributes.name: twitter:title
attributes.content: Updating Gatsby, Plugins and Solving Sharp Dependency Building Failure on Ubuntu using WSL

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Recently I started getting my feet wet on headless CMS. I chose the following stack to work with: Contentful + Gatsby + Material-UI. After upgrading Gatsby and other dependencies the project no longer worked due to some issues with sharp. That all happened while workin on Ubuntu under WSL.
